Title: Blade Runner 60: Director's Cut
Writer: Richard Cosgrove, Philip K. Dick (story), Hampton Fancher (story), David Webb Peoples (story)
Actors: George Xander, Catherine Adams, Lawrence Carmichael, Rob Lyndon
Plot: This is a the full cut of a remake of Blade Runner originally created for Empire Magazine's Done in Sixty Seconds competition. Blade Runner 60 moves the film's action to London, and takes ...
